= Introduction =
we can't even imagine the things we want to display or how do we want to display. 
Fortunately there is a way to help you.

Below are a list of options that can be applied to any Bvb_Grid_Source_*
==Available Options==

 * helper
 * order
 * tooltipFilter
 * tooltipTitle
 * title
 * remove
 * escape
 * hidden
 * decorator
 * hRow
 * position
 * orderField
 * class
 * searchType
 * searchTypeFixed
 * search
 * format
 * callback
 * style
